snippet: Because segments considered critical to transforming Brazil's economy have fallen by the wayside, the country has doubled down on its goal of promoting technology growth.
abstract: Because segments considered critical to transforming Brazil's economy have fallen by the wayside, the country has doubled down on its goal of promoting technology growth.

headline.main: Brazil Steps Up Investments in Overlooked Tech Start-Ups
headline.print_headline: Brazil Steps Up Investments in Crucial, but Overlooked, Technology Start-Ups
